sections.general: electronic technician ii profile to acquire an electronic engineering position in an organization where my productive skills and experience will contribute to the success of that company. committed, motivated, customer-service focused ,forward-thinking electronic engineer with hand-on experience performing quality troubleshooting, electronics system design and development.
